data.name: Antioch: Scarlet Bay
data.detailed_description:
Play as one of two detectives working together to solve an intriguing crime.
The adventure will take you to the city of Antioch, a dark metropolis between the mountains and the sea.


Your partner in the game is a real person: a complete stranger or a friend.
Both players decide on the direction of the story - you won't always agree with your partner.
How will you choose to pursue the case?


The city is filled with characters with their own motivations and behaviors.
Discovering their stories (or choosing not to) will change your experience of the story.



French author specialized in interactive fiction, working in different fields such as books where you are the hero, role-playing games, comics and video games. Creator of Out There and Game of Roles.

Shape a unique relationship between the two protagonists
Discover a dozen different endings depending on your choices.


The game is fully multiplatform (PC / MAC / LINUX - Android / iOS).
Play with your friends or strangers on all devices.

data.short_description: Antioch: Scarlet Bay is an online cooperative narrative adventure. Play as two detectives working together to solve a murder in the shadowy city of Antioch. Wander in a city filled with characters with their own agendas and attitudes, all your decisions change the story and lead to multi endings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II X2 245 or higher/greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-241M @ 2.30GHz or Greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Crimes and mention of crimes.
Violence and mention of violence. 
Mention of domestic violence.
Mild sexual content. 
Mention of drugs.
Rude language, swear words and insults. 
One dialog mention a potential pedophile.
